value.title: New Player's Guide to SC2 Multiplayer - Picking a Race & Getting Started
value.excerpt: Starcraft 2 is FREE TO PLAY! I try to show all the things silver league me wishes he had known in 2010!! value.title: Chill Zerg Gameplay | Trying to play aggressively vs Terran
value.excerpt: #ZergVsTerran #Starcraft2 #Gameplay #Commentary In today's video we're doing some chill zerg gameplay and we're going to be playing very aggressively. I'm done taking my beatings as zerg, it's time to take the fight to the terran!  0:00 - Intro/Teaser 0:32 - Zerg Gameplay 11:20 - Like/Subscribe/Share

value.title: Mastering Starcraft 2: Defensive Protoss vs Terran
value.excerpt: In today's Starcraft 2 tutorial we look at a high-grandmaster match between myself and Lord Timorus. I'm using a very defensive protoss style with colossus and blink vs a mine drop into 3 rax. Let's master Starcraft 2 together!  #Starcraft #protoss #colossus #sc2 #guide #RTS #realtimestrategy #StarCraft2

value.title: StarCraft 2: How-to Baneling Bust INTELLIGENTLY! (Guide)
value.excerpt: Baneling Busting is one of the easiest Zerg all-ins in the game. Most Zerg players are aware of this strategy and realise that it works great on the lower part of the ladder in Zerg versus Terran, Zerg versus Protoss and Zerg versus Zerg.   In this video I discuss how to Baneling Bust intelligent instead

value.excerpt: A newbie guide for Starcraft 2 multiplayer! value.title: Starcraft 2 Newbie Guide - 005 - Training: Stage 3
